title: Social Security Quick Calculator - User Data
description: User data required to calculate Social Security retirement, disability, and survivor benefit estimates

current_earnings.description: Current year annual earnings in dollars

dollar_type.description: Whether to show benefits in today's dollars or inflated (future) dollars

last_year_worked.description: Optional: Last year you had covered earnings (4 digits, for retired individuals)

last_year_earnings.description: Optional: Earnings in the last year you worked (for retired individuals)
